title: Sunday Night in America with Trey Gowdy
overview: Trey Gowdy will offer insightful analysis and a new outlook on the latest issues facing the country. Capitalizing on his experiences as a former prosecutor and Chairman of the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee, the former South Carolina Congressman will utilize his signature mixture of wisdom, humor and historical references to break down the latest legal and political news from across the nation. "Sunday Night in America" will offer seasoned perspective while providing viewers with the tools and information to draw their own conclusions. The program will also feature timely, solution-oriented interviews with decision makers and Washington insiders, as well as original stories of triumph and success highlighting why Americans should be optimistic about the future.
